sentence: Like Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Rep. Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, the former GOP nominee is also one of the few in his party to call out Trump's extremism, in the knowledge that he is ostracizing himself from his own party.
author: Stephen Collinson
title: Obama and Romney are back, and show how American politics have changed for the worse
